weekly_top_story.headline: President Signs 2026 Spending Package to End Brief Shutdown; Trump Administration Launches TrumpRX
weekly_top_story.summary: The President signed a spending package ending a brief federal government shutdown that disrupted HHS funding and reinstated key Medicare flexibilities like Hospital-at-Home and telehealth, stabilizing healthcare operations and averting broader service interruptions.

stories.headline: NIH Grant Disruptions Slow Down Breast Cancer Research
stories.summary: Trump administration disruptions to NIH grants have significantly slowed groundbreaking breast cancer research at a key lab, threatening progress on life-saving treatments amid uncertain federal funding.

stories.headline: CDC Data Show Decline In Hospital-Related Infections In 2024
stories.summary: CDC reports reveal significant declines in serious hospital-acquired infections like central line bloodstream infections (down 9%) and catheter-associated UTIs (down 10%) from 2023 to 2024, signaling improved patient safety post-COVID.
